title: Gemini Nano Demo
description: A very minimal example of a Gemini Nano node that picks a random question to test the capabilities of the LLM.

array.title: Array
array.default: ["What is the process of photosynthesis?","Define 'gravity.'","Translate 'Thank you' to Spanish.","Spell the word 'accommodate.'","What is 50 divided by 2?","Summarise the plot of a classic fairy tale like 'Cinderella.'","What is the cube root of 27?","Correct the grammar in the sentence: 'Him and me went to the store.'","Explain the principle of natural selection in simple terms.","Describe the main characters in the story 'Little Red Riding Hood.'","Solve the equation x^2 - 4x + 4 = 0.","Explain the importance of the Turing test in the context of Artificial Intelligence.","Write a short story about a lost treasure in a hidden cave.","Compare the themes of freedom and responsibility in two different novels.","Describe the main differences between a compiler and an interpreter in computer programming.","Discuss the potential applications of machine learning in healthcare.","Compose a poem about the changing seasons.","Derive the formula for the volume of a sphere.","Discuss the concept of existentialism in philosophy.","Analyse the benefits and challenges of renewable energy sources."]

configuration.name: run
